Title: XamlScaffolding
Description: XamlScaffolding is a set of T4 Templates that use T4Scaffolding package to generate XAML applications - Silverlight/Windows Phone/Win8
HomeWiki:
Project Description
XamlScaffolding is a set of T4 Templates that use T4Scaffolding package to generate XAML applications - Silverlight/Windows Phone/Win8

Project main goal is to make building Xaml based applciations base functionality fast and easy.
